text:
Hi,

i was using fop 0.20.5 to render pdf documents from xml data.
With this version i had some issues with page breaks and that's why i started
trying newer releases.

The problem now is the following:
JPG (also GIF) images are not displayed in place and with the correct sizing.
This issue started with 0.93 and continues with 0.94 (using exactly the same xml
and xsl files).
creator: lmartinou@infocad.gr

text:
Created attachment 20718
a resulting pdf file

in the attached file you will see 2 overlapping images.
When acrobat opens, the images are not visible, after some seconds they appear
one after the other, rescale on the screen and finally overlap.
creator: lmartinou@infocad.gr
jeremias@apache.org
text:
Please don't just attach the resulting PDF. We need an FO file to see what
you've tried to do.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: resolved invalid due to lack of information (FO input file, PDF output file, etc)
